message: is there a command available for the or do I need to roll my own extension script?

There isn't a command now but would be useful.  Yes, of course you could write a simple script to do it (useful examples are in scripts/editor_extensions.py in your Wing installation).  Sorry for very late reply... I created this group to reserve the name but haven't done much with it yet.
well now we have some content in here at least. :)
